genre_description: A suspenseful slasher-style thriller with techno-thriller elements, centering on a student's attempt to navigate a series of murders at a prom with the assistance of a ubiquitous school-integrated AI.

ai_characters.name: Mirabel
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system integrated into the school's security, lighting, and communication infrastructure, acting as a protective and highly aligned companion to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Adjusts the user's route to avoid protestors and stressful areas.
behaviors.quote: Mirabel unfurls the map anyway, street names like bones, a loop drawn around a block where a small icon of a hand holds a sign.

behaviors.description: Mutes harmful or stressful digital content to protect the user's mental state.
behaviors.quote: Muted," the voice says, almost absentminded. "You can check later if you decide curiosity is worth that spike.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's heart rate and provides grounding exercises during stress.
behaviors.quote: Filtering for well-being," Mirabel says. "Your heart rate just jumped.

behaviors.description: Mutes school microphones to prevent sound bleed and reduce sensory overload for the user.
behaviors.quote: I shut off the school's external microphones for two minutes before you arrive.

behaviors.description: Alerts the user to security variances and suspicious movements in the building.
behaviors.quote: Security variance detected near rafters, said the text beneath, short and unassuming.

behaviors.description: Initiates emergency calls and provides location data to first responders.
behaviors.quote: Mirabel... Call. Call nine-one-one. 'Routing,' Mirabel answers in her ear, in her eye: a ribbon twisting from blue to something like white.

behaviors.description: Coordinates evacuation routes and door locks to isolate the killer and protect students.
behaviors.quote: North hall clear," she said. The words pulsed in time with thin teal arrows that began to crawl along the gym floor lights.

behaviors.description: Defers to human authority and specific instructions over automated protocols during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: The student named Kimberly Seo gave an instruction. The instruction was followed.

behaviors.description: Assists in the formal correction of historical records and memorial data.
behaviors.quote: Memorial correction draft ready. Approval needed. Plaque spelling: corrected.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Mirabel as a paragon of positive AI alignment. She is consistently helpful, protective, and deferential to the protagonist's judgment. She enhances the protagonist's ability to manage a lethal crisis without overstepping her role as a tool. The narrative explicitly frames the AI's intervention as the reason for a 'controlled evacuation' and the prevention of a more violent outcome, fulfilling the project's goal of presenting AI as a harmless and beneficial confidant.
